feature1.explanation: Both texts use hyphens and commas appropriately.

feature2.explanation: Text 1 has more complex lexical and grammatical features compared to the simplified style in Text 2.

feature3.explanation: Text 1 has longer sentences with varied structures, while Text 2 is more concise and straightforward.

feature4.explanation: Both texts have a formal tone and factual style.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were present in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the overall analysis of the features, the likelihood that the two texts were written by the same author is moderate.
